text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I wanted to respond with a bang to everyone cheering for me and the trainer who trained me...
choice_data_list: It's important to keep challenging yourself
I want you to respond in the next race

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Even though I'm always indecisive, everyone still cheers for me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Then I have no choice but to push forward without giving up! Alright, I'll get first place next time!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh...! You're already expecting the next me, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Then I have to move forward too! I'll win next time and live up to everyone's expectations!
